summary: I'm  admittedly not the biggest fan of everything this season (I feel like I still enjoy it more than most people here tho lol)...
body: I’m admittedly not the biggest fan of everything this season (I feel like I still enjoy it more than most people here tho lol) but I’m really happy to see the latest clip getting a lot of attention on french Twitter, from people being shocked/happy that this topic was brought up on french TV cause it never happens. That reminds me why I’m glad the remakes were made to some extent.

reblog.comment: I’m admittedly not the biggest fan of everything this season (I feel like I still enjoy it more than most people here tho lol) but I’m really happy to see the latest clip getting a lot of attention on french Twitter, from people being shocked/happy that this topic was brought up on french TV cause it never happens. That reminds me why I’m glad the remakes were made to some extent.

That reminds me why I’m glad the remakes were made to some extent.

tags: watch everything I wrote not happen lmaooo
clown makeup is on point as always
summary: so we have 3 clips left, right? here's how i think it's going to go down this week. we'll probably get clips with lucas, manon...
body:
so we have 3 clips left, right? here’s how i think it’s going to go down this week.

we’ll probably get clips with lucas, manon and sofiane.

a mercredi clip with the biology buds
1. maybe this would be a parallel with isak confronting sana at her locker? lucas probably figured out that it was imane who actually sent the email to charles but he took the blame for it (maybe charles will punch him offscreen? if so, i will fly to paris and kick mr. munier right in the balls) so now manon is mad at him and lucas is mad at imane (ugh)
OR
2. lucas opened up about his argument with eliott about idriss and imane, getting fed up with all that’s happening around her blows up at lucas and inadvertently reveals something about what happened between eliott and idriss.

clip with manon with/without the other girls.
1. imane finally tells manon that she was the one who sent charles the email. manon reveals what charles did which would make imane even guiltier about what she did. cue manon walking out.
OR
2. alexia finds out that imane turned down the part on her behalf and in retaliation, she tells manon what imane did. le crew confronts imane and they all walk out on her.

the talk with sofiane happens this friday. i actually have no idea on how this one’s gonna go. will sofiane explain his actions on why he decided to go for it with manon? will he even acknowledge how much this hurt imane? will they have a dance off? i don’t really know a;lsdkjfal;sdkf

but then there’s also charles. will he punch someone this friday? i hope he does and it’s ingrid. oops his hand slipped, sorry ingrid. maybe it’s his way of redeeming himself lol.

with the title of episode 8, everything will come to a head this vendreadi (then again, when does it fucking not ajsdf;lkajdf). hopefully, the healing starts with a family clip immediately on saturday (papa and maman bakhellal i know you’re gonna come thru) and it’s upward from there.

another random thought for next week: imane and ingrid will face off once again and ingrid shows her true colors, says something really racist, not knowing that the girls are behind her and will hear everything. this is how i see the los losers van moment playing out. i’m kinda scared about this though because once again, it could easily turn out to be the white girls saving/protecting/defending the black girl. :/ i really really hope they give the le crew reunion scene justice and make it so imane’s the one who defends herself. the girls would just stay silent the whole time until ingrid finally realizes that they heard her. she'll definitely try to weasel her way out the situation and even hold the vacation over their heads but they’re having none of it. she’ll finally reveal her true colors, walks out (never to be seen again, yay) and the girls FINALLY apologize to imane.

whew, just even theorizing is tiring. can our queen just get a break already ffs.

summary: to see everyone around imane defend that racist bitch ingrid, to see them completely dismiss imane’s anger because her standing...
body: to see everyone around imane defend that racist bitch ingrid, to see them completely dismiss imane’s anger because her standing up for herself and her people makes them uncomfortable…… it boils my damn blood. yes imane has fucked up, yes she acts out, but this is why. she’s afraid no one will understand, that they won’t care the way they should, so she bottles it all up and it comes out in awful ways. she’s wrong for it, but her reason for why it happens? is completely spot on. no one understands.

reblog.comment: to see everyone around imane defend that racist bitch ingrid, to see them completely dismiss imane’s anger because her standing up for herself and her people makes them uncomfortable…… it boils my damn blood. yes imane has fucked up, yes she acts out, but this is why. she’s afraid no one will understand, that they won’t care the way they should, so she bottles it all up and it comes out in awful ways. she’s wrong for it, but her reason for why it happens? is completely spot on. no one understands.

tags: I'll criticize s4 any day but that scene is wonderful
the skamfr girl squad better do something BIG for Imane
summary: I just rewatched the scene in OG skam where the girls show up in their own bus to get Sana and say “If you mess with Sana you...
body: I just rewatched the scene in OG skam where the girls show up in their own bus to get Sana and say “If you mess with Sana you mess with us”. Even though the writing for s4 was shitty, this scene is so heartwarming and I can’t help but tear up every time I see Sana’s big beautiful smile when the girls call out to her. I really don’t know if Skam France can pull off a scene like this with their girl squad after all this drama and still have it be rewarding.

I really don’t know if Skam France can pull off a scene like this with their girl squad after all this drama and still have it be rewarding.

blog.name: gulegardiner
blog.title: pas peur
blog.description: hel. she. russian. always anxious and tired of everything

summary: I never thought I would say this but I'm tired of the amount of Elu promo sigh. It's also hard to tell the difference between...
question: I never thought I would say this but I'm tired of the amount of Elu promo sigh. It's also hard to tell the difference between pictures of the characters and pictures of the actors...which is a little problematic imo. Sometimes I think even the production team themselves don't know the difference😬😂😂
answer: haha no i’m never tired lmao because sometimes it’s the only way to see them lmao but you know even maxence said that sometimes he was forgetting if he is maxence or eliott in the mornings during rehearsals and shooting because he felt like he was living that life, and you know it’s wild but also explains why everything what we saw in season three kind of magical, so i like it but i get you, because there are people who really can’t draw a line between the show and real life
